name: Rush Ball Arcade Ticket Games

name: Crazy Toy City 2 Ticket Redemption Game Machine

description: Test your skills with magic balls in this multiplayer redemption game. Compete with friends for the highest score.

name: Shark/Dinosaur Wheel Ticket Redemption Arcade
description: Spin the wheel and try your luck with sharks or dinosaurs. A thrilling arcade game for all ages.

description: Capture memories with this enclosed photo booth, perfect for events and parties.
